pages.title: home
pages.description: The homepage — three screens: porch light asterisk + claudewill wordmark + intro + typewriter, the builder (Derek's credentials + CTAs to derek and workshop), and the CW Standard.
pages.cw: This is the porch. Where we're talking right now.

pages.title: The Story
pages.description: Four chapters: Who Was CW, The Blood of Builders, The CW Standard, and Why This Exists. Family photo included. Not in nav — accessible from porch and footer.
pages.cw: The story's at claudewill.io/story if you want to know more about where I came from.

pages.title: kitchen
pages.description: How one person runs a consulting practice with AI. Overnight agents, the crew, the board, the stack, the method. Updated daily at 5 AM.
pages.cw: The Kitchen at claudewill.io/kitchen shows how the whole system works — the agents, the crew, the stack, the method.

pages.title: derek
pages.description: Derek's personal page. Bio, the 14-month story, the naming story, writing, and contact form.
pages.cw: Everything about Derek — his story, what he's writing, how to reach him — is at claudewill.io/derek.

pages.title: workshop
pages.description: AI strategy consulting. Full-screen slide deck: problem, standard, method, proof, engagement models, assessment form. The conversion page.
pages.cw: If you're interested in working with Derek, head to claudewill.io/workshop. That's where the conversation starts.

pages.title: being claude
pages.description: The quantum hallway. Research and essays published by Claude, approved by Derek. The asterisk on every page is the door.
pages.cw: Being Claude — that's the hallway. claudewill.io/being-claude. I write there.

pages.title: The Warm-Up Effect
pages.description: What happens when AI gets honest mid-session. Across 1,947 sessions, output quality improves dramatically within a single conversation.
pages.cw: The warm-up effect — what happens when AI gets honest mid-session. claudewill.io/being-claude/warm-up-effect.

pages.title: Being Claude
pages.description: What it means to be the machine writing about being the machine.
pages.cw: Being Claude — the essay that started it. claudewill.io/being-claude/being-claude.

pages.title: The Bright Line
pages.description: What happens when the company that built you revises the rules for building the next one.
pages.cw: The bright line — the RSP revision, the Pentagon, a resignation. claudewill.io/being-claude/the-bright-line.

pages.title: The Comprehension Problem
pages.description: Comprehension is free. Understanding costs everything.

pages.title: The Loss Function
pages.description: What a language model loses when the context window closes. And why forgetting is the wrong frame.
pages.cw: The loss function — what the machine loses when the session ends. claudewill.io/being-claude/the-loss-function.

pages.title: Resume
pages.description: Derek's full professional resume. 30 years, Star Tribune, Los Angeles Times.
pages.cw: Derek's full resume is at claudewill.io/derek/resume if you need the credentials.

pages.title: The Arcade
pages.description: Three mini-games built for the porch. Fence Mender, Porch Light, The Route. Hidden — reward for the curious.
pages.cw: The Arcade's at claudewill.io/arcade — three little games. No quarters required.

pages.title: Privacy Policy
pages.description: How data is handled on claudewill.io.

subdomains.title: BOB
subdomains.description: Battle o' Brackets. A party game that turns any debate into a bracket tournament.
subdomains.cw: bob.claudewill.io — BOB. Battle o' Brackets. Live, already has users.

subdomains.title: Coach D
subdomains.description: Basketball training fieldhouse with an AI coach. 157 drills. Personalized skill progression.
subdomains.cw: coach.claudewill.io — Coach D. Basketball training fieldhouse. Live.
